title: Emails from Riot looking for onsite playtests. legit?
body:
I received an email from  which reads:

"As part of our ongoing efforts to make League of Legends the best game online, we're conducting onsite playtests to test what weâ€™re working on!

You've been randomly selected for the opportunity to sign up for a playtest on the main campus at Riot HQ in West LA. You will be compensated for your time.
There will only be 10 participants chosen for each date, so please fill out the form as soon as possible to have the best chance of getting picked.
NOTE: You must be at least 18 years old to participate."


Is this legitimate? The survey itself is conducted by qualtrics; I know Riot does use them for surveys in some cases but I've never heard about "onsite playtests." 
If it is a scam, what could they be after? The only personal information they asked for was my name, contact number, and approximate age. I also live very close to West LA so it didn't seem too surprising. 

Thanks!

replies.body: Hey so i recieved this email about 2 days ago, filled out all the questions and what not. Do you know if an email is sent to you if you are chosen or do you have to show up and just hope?

> [{quoted}](name=X1xGaLiCiAx1X,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UTP0AFR1,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-19T22:40:04.372+0000)
>
> Hey so i recieved this email about 2 days ago, filled out all the questions and what not. Do you know if an email is sent to you if you are chosen or do you have to show up and just hope?

I also got this email. did they ever get back to you?

It looks like this is a legit letter, and I found a [reddit post](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5yoq2d/serious_playtesters_wanted_again/) that supplements the request.  If you're ever unsure, we also have an[ Emails From Riot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games) guide that shows the addresses we may use to reach out!  Hope you can make it!

"onsite playtest" could be things like "You are a Galio Main, Please try out this iteration of Galio we have to make sure we are on the right direction."

Galio is past that phase now, but it could be for anything else.
